wikipedia_page.main: Alex Cooper (born 4 November 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a left-back for Scottish Championship club Queen of the South, having previously played for Ross County, Elgin City (loan spell), Falkirk, St Mirren, Cheltenham Town, East Fife, Inverness Caledonian Thistle, Fresno in the USA and Sligo Rovers. Cooper is also a former Liverpool youth player and former Scotland U17 youth international.

response: On 29 January, midfielder Alex Cooper signed until the end of the season after being released by Falkirk.
